reviews.comments: Vista al Nahuel Huapi con atardeceres impagables que son acompañados por una cabaña con todos los detalles a la perfección que permiten magnificar esos momentos. La hospitalidad  y consejos de Nuno suman y son un plus. Volveremos. Gracias

Una perla en Bariloche!! La casa es hermosa y extremadamente acogedora. Es la perfecta definición de un hogar lejos de tu hogar. Un lugar a donde cansado de excursiones, quieres llegar  casi diría desesperadamente. 
La ubicación es ideal, ya que está cerca del centro y de camino a las mejores excursiones. 
Desayunar cada mañana con esas vistas increíbles, no tiene precio, las fotos no permiten transmitir semejante belleza. Desde todos los ambientes tienes una visual mejor que otra, hasta en el baño!!!  La casa, además de estar perfectamente equipada y calefaccionada, es muy confortable y decorada con excelente gusto. Tiene de todo, incluso algunos detalles que a veces uno olvida cuando sale de viaje. Tiene dos enormes balcones donde puedes tomar una cerveza o simplemente sentarte a admirar el paisaje.
Nuno fue el perfecto anfitrión, nos esperó con una botella de vino y siempre dispuesto a  ayudarnos en lo que necesitáramos. Excelente la comunicación.
Realmente un placer pasar allí nuestras vacaciones. Seguramente volveremos!!

Nuno es un excelente anfitrion. Nos esperó con un pan casero y un dulce, y sin ningun problema porque nuestro vuelo se atrasó 2 horas. La casa es mucho más linda que lo que se ve en fotos. La vista es espectacular, no dan ganas de irse. Super equipada y muy bien calefaccionada. Eramos 4 adultos y estabamos muy comodos. Sin dudas, cuando vuelva a Bariloche, la voy a volver a elegir.
Excelente casa, maravillosa vista sobre el lago, decoración cuidada y de muy buen gusto. Todo ha sido perfecto y, un plus, la amable y esmerada atención de Nuno. Super recomendable!!!

La casa es excelente, las vistas, la comodidad, el sentirse siempre en (URL HIDDEN) atención de Nuno de primera, siempre fue muy atento, desde nuestra llegada, al recibirnos con una botella de vino y una mermelada casera. Todo nuestra estadía, fue disfrute!

Mi nueva joyita en san carlos!
Despertarse e ir a desayunar contemplando la vista desde la cocina nos pareció ridículamente de ensueño. Nos enamoramos completamente de la casa que a pesar de la corta estadía, sentimos como hogar. 
Nuno super amable se tomó el tiempo de explicarnos todo y estuvo siempre en contacto. Sin duda volveremos ;)

Es un lugar hermoso. No dudaria ni medio segundo en volver ahí.
La casa es hermosa. La vista impagable. Todos los servicios funcionan impecables, y la recepción de nuno fue muy calida.

Gracias por todo
Emiliano - Giuliana - Olivia

Excelente lugar, confortable, con todo lo necesario y más y una vista maravillosa. Lindo recibimiento de Nuno con predisposición a contar todo lo necesario para empezar las vacaciones. Un placer haber conocido y disfrutado del lugar y de nuestro anfitrión! Si quieren traerle un regalo aceite de oliva es la clave! Ja
Un lugar desde la arquitectura, la vista, la comodidad y la atención para destacar, disfrutar y felicitar. No se van a arrepentir. Muy recomendable.-

Hermosa cabaña, un sueño. vista increíble y todo de excelente calidad y comodidad!espero volver!muy buena comunicación con Nuno que nos recibió de forma excelente y fue súper flexible con los horarios de check in y check out

Una estancia inolvidable. Desde la atención del anfitrión Nuno, hasta los detalles de la casa.
La vista es envidiable, se ve el lago de un modo privilegiado, se puede salir al deck a tomar alguna bebida con amigos y simplemente disfrutar del entorno. 
La casa se encuentra en  perfecto estado y super equipada.  Limpia, ordenada y muy cómoda.
Nuno fue muy atento en todo, nos ha recomendado desde lugares para comer como para aventurarnos en excursiones. Si andan con ganas de hospedarse en bariloche y con ganas de caminar, este lugar es ideal. No lo duden.

Estuvimos con mi mujer y dos adolescentes durante 6 días. La casa es increíble, súper luminosa, muy cómoda y por demás agradable. Tiene de todo, y no exagero. Hay detalles que cuando uno está de viaje no tiene en cuenta o se olvida, y en la casa hay de todo como para salir del paso o incluso solucionarlo. Esto hace que sea súper confortable para ir en grupo o en familia.
No tengo palabras para describir la vista que tiene la casa. Realmente creo que cualquier diferencia monetaria que pudiera haber con otros alojamientos se paga, y con creces, con esa vista. No hay cámara de fotos en el mundo que pueda transmitir lo que se ve todos los días desde allí, tanto al amanecer como al atardecer. 
Está muy bien ubicada en un lugar que mezcla tranquilidad y cercanía a las zonas turísticas y gastronómicas. 
La casa tiene detalles encantadores que hacen que a uno no le den ganas de irse o por lo menos volver pronto.
Para los amantes del asado, es para destacar que la parrilla se encuentra adentro y tiene tan bien tiraje que no deja ni una gota de humo, permitiéndole al asador no sufrir por demás del frío.
Nuno fue un anfitrión de primera. Estuvo siempre atento y a nuestra disposición para cualquier consulta, duda o recomendación que le pidiéramos. Nos esperó en la casa con un vino de regalo que estuvo exquisito, y nos dio un montón de recomendaciones tanto para lugares para conocer como para ir a comer.
Si tienen la suerte de dar con este aviso, no lo duden, no busquen más. Este es el lugar indicado para sus vacaciones.
El lugar perfecto! La vista, impecable! Muy recomendable!!!

Lo que se puede apreciar en las fotos de la publicación son mucho menos de lo que es realidad la casa. Es increíble esta casa. Lo mejor de este Bariloche. La vista, la paz, lo íntimo... Es 100% funcional. La verdad me dan ganas de comprarla si es que estuviera a la venta... Recomiendo totalmente

Primero que todo Nuno es lo más, súper amable nos trató excelente. La casa es mucho más linda que las fotos y no dan ganas de irse. La pasamos muy bien y disfrutamos mucho. Gracias Nuno por las recomendaciones hicieron de nuestro viaje un viaje inolvidable.

La estadía en la casa fue perfecta, Nuno, un excelente anfitrión, la casa funciona bárbaro, la vista es inmejorable y la ubicación igual.  Nuno siempre muy accesible y predispuesto a todas nuestras inquietudes. Volveríamos a ir, sin dudarlo. Súper recomendable!!

Nuno fue muy amable y super atento a las consultas que le hicimos tanto previo como durante el viaje. La cabaña es igual que en las fotos, y es muy comoda y acogedora. Super contentos con la experiencia.

La descripción es la correcta. La casa es muy bonita, está muy bien cuidada, limpia y la vista es increible. Nos sentimos muy cómodos y Nuno nos facilitó los datos necesarios para conocer el barrio y mejorar nuestra estadía. También muy facil coordinar el horario de entrada y salida.
Hermosisima casa y un excelente anfitrion!. Genio Nuno!!
me convenció las comodidades de la casa, la ubicación y por sobre todo la vista. La calefacción es buenísima. La casa está super completa.

Nuno es un gran anfitrión, super amable y atento. La casa es hermosa y con una gran vista, todo tal como se muestra en las fotos. Antes de irnos volvimos a reservar para diciembre porque el lugar y la atención fueron impecables. Muchas gracias!!!!

Nos sentimos como en casa, además de cálido sumamente confortable y funcional hasta en el más mínimo detalle. La vista es increíble y las fotos no alcanzan a mostrar lo maravilloso del lugar.
El barrio es muy tranquilo y seguro rodeado de mucha vegetación.

La experiencia en la casa de Nuno no podría haber sido mejor. La casa es preciosa, confortable,  limpia y está muy bien equipada. La ubicación es muy buena, ya que está relativamente cerca de todos los lugares pero en un barrio muy tranquilo. Sobre todas las cosas, tiene una vista increíble. Nuno nos recibió eficiente y cálidamente y estuvo atento a nuestros pedidos o consultas. Sin dudas volvería a hospedarme allí. Gracias Nuno por vuestra hospitalidad. 
.
La casa es espectacular, tal como se ve en las fotos. Y el servicio que nos brindó Nuno, fue perfecto. 100% recomendable.

Gran lugar, todo lo ofrecido es real, recomendable 100%.
Es de destacar también la predisposición del Anfritrión para facilitar la estadía.

La casa es hermosa por donde se mire! Estaba todo impecable, es muy comoda y moderna. Tiene ventanales con una vista al Nahuel Huapi divina! Tiene todo lo que necesitas para pasar una buena estadía. La recomiendo 100% y si volviera a ir a Bariloche la volvería a alquilar. Realmente hermosa!!

La casa es hermosa, estaba todo impecable, súper limpio y funcionando. La casa tiene muchísima luz y sol, una vista increible al lago. Como hizo un poco de frio prendimos la salamandra y dio un calor muy agradable. La casa está completamente equipada (cocina, sábanas, toallas). La comunicación con Nuno muy fluida y nos ayudó en todo lo que pudo, incluso recomendando restaurantes (muy buenos!) y lugares para visitar. Incluso nos dio un mapa (como si fuera un hotel). 
Recomiendo muchísimo el lugar.
El mejor lugar que existe !! Es mucho mejor que en foto, cerca de todo y tranquilo un verdadero oasis en Bariloche
Muy bonita y una vista preciosa

Nuno es un anfitrión espectacular. Tiene el carisma de recibirte en casa, y el profesionalismo para hacer del lugar un destino perfecto. La ubicación es muy buena si uno renta auto, cerca de Cerro Oto y en camino hacia Llao Llao. La decoración y diseño de la casa son muy cuidados, y todo está perfectamente. Tuvimos unas horas de falta de internet, pero después funcionó muy bien. Al llegar las recomendaciones y detalles de Nuno fueron tan inesperadas como magníficas. Entiendo que también tiene otras cabañas en el bosque, ¡deben ser encantadoras! No dudaría en regresar.

Pasamos 5 dias inolvidables en Bariloche con nuestros hijos de 14 y 18. La casa de Nuno y su hospitalidad hizo que las vacaciones fueran perfectas. La casa espectacular realmente como lo muestran las fotos, las vistas de cada espacio de la casa fascinantes. Nos sentimos muy comodos, la casa totalmente equipada con todo lo necesario y muy limpia, impecable. Nuno super atento, nos recibio con un vino, nos dio recomendaciones, y durante la estadia nos ayudo varias veces con algunas dudas.  Volveria sin ninguna duda!!

Nuno excelente anfitrión...
La casa maravillosa y muy (URL HIDDEN) nos faltó nada ...
Definitivamente muy recomendable.
La casa fue increible mi familia estuvo durante  una semana, la vista maravillosa, recomendado el lugar.

El sitio es espectacular y fiel reflejo de lo que muestran las fotos, en realidad es un placer solo quedarse en casa y observar el paisaje. Las zonas comunes son muy amplias, cálidas y luminosas, y es una delicia estar en la cocina o comer con esa vista tan impresionante. Adicionalmente está muy bien ubicado, especialmente si es la primera vez en Bariloche, porque es muy central y cerca a los puntos de interés. Para acceder a la casa se deben bajar unas escaleras y para llegar al alojamiento y moverse con facilidad lo más recomendable es contar con un automóvil . Nuno es un anfitrión excelente, muy atento a responder cualquier requerimiento en todo momento. Adicionalmente nos dio las mejores recomendaciones y sugerencias para conocer Bariloche, así como para ir a comer delicioso (En especial el restaurante Salamandra :) y contactos para las actividades que uno puede hacer en Invierno.  Como bono adicional Nuno tuvo la cortesía de regalarnos una mermelada y la dueña del lugar unas deliciosas medialunas porque estaba apenada por un pequeño inconveniente que tuvimos con el calentador. Fue una experiencia inolvidable y sin duda alguna volveríamos a alojarnos en este lugar!

Esta casa es el complemento perfecto de Bariloche. Calor de hogar, 100% equipada para tener una estadía confortable. Tienes todos los implementos necesarios por si deseas cocinar. Todo funciona perfecto. Ideal para un viaje en pareja. Las fotos no mienten.
La casa no está en el centro de Bariloche (5Km), y esto es positivo. Sin embargo considere que tiene que usar transporte público o idealmente alquilar un carro (altamente recomendado, para conocer todas las atracciones de la zona).
Nuno es un caballero, y hizo que nuestra visita fuera más agradable. Definitivamente, volveremos.
____
This home is the perfect complement to Bariloche. A home 100% equipped for a comfortable stay. Have all the necessary equipment for cooking if desired. Everything works perfect. Ideal for a romantic trip. Pictures don´t lie. 
The house is not in Bariloche downtown, (it´s 5Km away), and this is positive. But consider that you have to use public transport or ideally rent a car (highly recommended, to explore all the attractions of Bariloche).
Nuno is a gentleman, and made our visit more enjoyable. Definitely we´ll return.

Desde antes de llegar a Bariloche que estuvimos en contacto con Nuno. El siempre se mostró dispuesto y muy atento a cada mail y pregunta que le hacíamos. Cuando llegaos a Bariloche, nos atendió de la manera mas grata posible, nos mostró la casa, sus tips y nos mando unos datos para orientarnos en nuestra visita por Bariloche. La casa: FE NO ME NAL. 100% recomendable, hermosa vista, precioso lugar. Queremos volver, Gracias Nuno por todo!!

La pasamos muy muy bien en esta casa, la casa es preciosa, es muy cómoda y super bien ubicada. El paisaje al amanecer( y durante todo el día) es increíble. La zona es muy silenciosa y lo mejor de todo es la vista tan increíble que tiene sobre el lago. Quisieramos poder volver pronto! Nuno nos atendió muy bien y es muy linda persona. Recomendamos totalmente este lugar.
Great place and beautiful surroundings
Amazing view, much much better than in the pictures!

It was a very nice experience in Bariloche. The apt is very warm and cozy. The view is awesome. It is located 5.5 Km from downtown in a peaceful neighborhood. Really, my girlfriend and me, have loved our stay there!
Numo is a lovely host! He had cared all details for our perfect stay.

Nuno is a perfect host, helpful, and attentive. The accommodation is perfect.  I can add nothing to what other reviewers have said.  If I return again to Bariloche it will be my preferred place to stay, close to all the sites and activities Bariloche has to offer.

Nuno was a great host. We had as a welcome gift flowers and wine. Thank you for that! The house is very nice and the location is perfect to visit Bariloche and the nature around. I highly recommend this place!!!

Loved this house.  It was just the right amount of space and had everything we needed. It's very comfortable and has beautiful views and a great kitchen. Two bedrooms (one double bed and one room with twins that can be pushed together) and 1.5 bathrooms. Nuno is next door if you need anything and is very kind.  From the photos - it looks more isolated than it actually is - but we enjoyed the location a few minutes outside of the centro. Easy to get everywhere.

Nuno! what a host! He was always helpful on every little thing we need, from the logistics of the house to recommendations on where to eat or what activities we should do while in bariloche. Thanks Nuno!

Nunos place is just amazing as the pictures show. The view is simply breathtaking, and the location is quite near to town. A car is an advantage.
Great flexibility with check out times

Ein absolutes Traumhaus mit sagenhafter Aussicht über den See und auf die Berge. Mit viel Liebe zum Detail eingerichtet und hervorragend ausgestattet. Alles super sauber und gepflegt. Das Wohnviertel sehr ruhig mit einem grossen Spielplatz in der Nähe, Verduleria, Bar (mit Craft Bier), Restaurants, Almacen alles fussläufig erreichbar. Insgesamt ist ein Auto empfehlenswert um z.B. in die Stadt, zu grossen Supermärkten oder in die Natur zu kommen. Nuno ist ein fantastischer und sehr professioneller Gastgeber. Alles lief rund, viele wertvolle Tips, super schneller und freundlicher Kontakt. Danke!! Insgesamt die beste AirBnB Erfahrung die wir bisher gemacht haben.

Erg mooie huis met een mooi uitzicht op de meer. Een auto is wel fijn voor deze locatie, omdat het huis op een heuvel is gebouwd. Verder heeft dit appartement alle voorzieningen. Van keukengerei, handdoeken en etc. 

Wat ik zelf erg prettig vond zijn de twee terrassen. S’ochtends kan je prima je ontbijt eten op één van de terrassen. Natuurlijk kan je ook overdag en in de avond van het uitzicht genieten. 

Tot slot, onze gastheer Nuno was erg gastvrij. We kregen van te voren een mail met bezienswaardigheden en tips voor goede restaurants.
Excellent host and beautiful home and view. Nuno knows the area well and gives very detailed and helpful trip advice.

We can't recommend this place highly enough. The view is spectacular (the pictures don't do it justice), and the house is beautifully designed, and has everything that you might need. Nuno was a fabulous host, who was really flexible about check-in and check-out, and who gave us some great tips about the area.

This place was truly amazing! Very stylish space and comfortable rooms with stunning views. 

Nuno was the perfect host and provided lots of tips for activities and restaurants in the area. He was also very quick to respond to any questions we had. 

The apartment is 5km from town but a short walk to the bus stop and some shops within walking distance for buying supplies. 

This is the best Airbnb I’ve stayed in to date and is highly recommended.

The view... I can't say enough about how amazing sipping a red wine and and taking in the majestic views on the front balcony, livingroom or bedrooms.  Wherever your at in the house it seems that you have a good view of lake and mountains!  10 min walk to grocery store or local pub.  Thanks for an amazing week!

The views from this "nest" are absolutely stunning and the location peaceful and relaxing (away from the main town).

Nuno is the perfect host and made our stay in Bariloche get off to a lovely start (despite the snow storm we landed in)!
Beautiful house with outstanding views. Have to drive to downtown and to stores, but easy to get to the mountains within 20 min drive. Safe, quiet, and beautiful

Quando decidimos ir para Bariloche com nossos dois filhos, a primeira coisa que nos preocupamos foi com a hospedagem, queríamos um lugar bonito, aconchegante e com uma bela vista.
Então, depois de selecionarmos vários lugares fomos ver a pontuação  e indicação dos já estiveram hospedados no imóvel.
Aí vem a pergunta: Qual o nível de exigência de cada um, pois o que é bom para um nem sempre é bom para outro…o que é importante pra mim, pode ser insignificante para o outro. Diante de tantas indicações positivas, escolhemos a cabana do Nuno, 
  foi a melhor escolha que já fizemos na vida, a cabana é perfeita, superou todas nossas expectativas. Confortável, moderna, possui todos os utensílios necessários…a vista…a vista é deslumbrante.
Pensa que acabou???….não…tem o Nuno por trás disso tudo, extremamente simpático, prestativo e solícito. Nos ajudou em tudo que precisamos. Ainda tivemos a oportunidade de conhecer a Lali, arquiteta e dona da cabana, um anjo. Tivemos um imprevisto na viagem(quebrei o pé patinando), e precisamos de auxílio médico, e lá estava a Lali e o Nuno nos dando todo o suporte necessário.
Só não posso dizer que tudo foi perfeito pelo imprevisto que tivemos, mas se voltarmos a Bariloche com certeza ficaremos novamente a cabana de Nuno.

This was without doubt the best Airbnb experience we have had. It exceeded expectation which is saying something as it looked great on booking.  However the view is spectacular, a real draw card. The Property is well-equipped. We even dined in two nights in succession so good was the feel of the place. Nuno was a splendid host.  The area speaks for itself. It is full of things to see and do. Recommend Caroljones riding.  Utterly wonderful. We had a hire car which helped a lot in getting round but bus stop at bottom of hill if needs be. Love to come back one day.

Beautiful place with stunning view ! The flat is clean, well located. We really felt at home ! Nuno is the perfect host, he gave us a map and provide us with all informations we needed. We had a great stay in Bariloche. Highly recommended.

This is a beautiful house with a gorgeous view. the house is well equipped and very comfortable. The host is very accommodating and welcoming. This Air B&B home is one of the highlights of our trip to San crlos Bariloche area.

Book this house if you go to Bariloche!  We loved this place from the moment we walked in and would model our own home from it.  The top-floor living room/kitchen/dining area have wall-length ceiling-high windows to offer wonderful views of the lake, mountains, and trees.  The kitchen is the best equipped we've had in multiple rentals with utensils, pots, pans, mugs, china, tools, etc to make great food at home.  The lower-level bedrooms and bathroom all have the same views over the lake, and are also well-equipped.  This home is out of town but we preferred the area over central Bariloche where we stayed for several days as well.  A car would be helpful but several buses pass by every 20 minutes right down the hill from the house and we used them multiple times with no issues.  Our favorite restaurant from three months in South America is also right down the hill from the house  (we went two nights in a row and ordered the same items).  
In addition to the house and area being lovely, Nuno is the best host we have had through about ten rentals.  His hospitality, personality, and professionalism are top notch, and we recommend any listing he manages just by our experience with him and this house.

Nuno's place is fantastic.  The home is very unique, beautiful, extremely clean, comfortable.  The views over the lake and mountains are incredible.  It was an unforgettable experience to sit out on the two decks and watch the views change with the morning and evening light. You can also clearly see the stars in the night sky from the decks!

Nuno is the perfect airbnb host.  He was there to greet me with a smile and offered terrific advice for my stay in Bariloche.  He was very helpful, kind, and responsive when I had any questions.  Gracias, Nuno!!

Stunning treehouse with spectacular views in Bariloche.  This unique home was our base for four lovely days exploring Bariloche.  It is situated a few miles out of town so a car is necessary but you would want that anyhow to do all the scenic drives.  It comes well furnished and the host was great to deal with and very responsive.  He gave excellent restaurant recommendations and other advice (don't miss the ribeye steak at El Boliche de Alberto's just down the road!)  As a family of four the layout was perfect with a master bedroom and another room with two twins that our children were happy (!) to share.  If you book this place make sure to add an extra day so you are not rushed and can truly enjoy the place and the views.  Worth it!
This house is an architectural gem with sweeping views of the lake.  Very peaceful and relaxing.  The house is comfortable and outfitted with all that is needed. Nuno is a terrific and helpful host.
Beautiful home with an incredible vista! Highly recommended!!

Nuno was the perfect host of an amazing space! I can certainly confirm all the positive recommendations he already has. We chose this place to celebrate Christmas - the kitchen was so well-equipped it was even easier to make a massive meal than home, we felt welcome right away the the view was paradise. Excellent place, no drawbacks at all. Thanks Nuno!!!

Beautifully designed house with an unbelievably awesome view over the lake and mountains. The house itself was very clean, well equipped and comfortable. Nuno was the perfect host and gave us lots of top tips. A perfect host and house.

Sometimes with reviews you think, there's no way a place is that good, these people must just be being nice. With this place, all the glowing reviews are so correct. This place is truly wonderful. 

Nuno greated us upon arrival (and we arrived early and couldn't contact him and he was already there waiting). Fresh flowers from the front yard all around the house, a great welcome with recommendations where we could walk to dinner. A local map on the table and the taxi company number on the fridge. 

The place is amazing. The view is great. The indoor parrilla is so fun.  The place is spotlessly clean, the bed super comfy, the front yard so full of flowers. The neighbors are so kind (we met them when we had a flat tire). It was such a treat to have a modern place to ourselves for 6 nights. 

While the house is just out of town (6km) there are fantastic restaurants within walking distance.  I'd recommend having a car but it wouldn't be required if you have a phone to call a cab or a bus card. 

This place was by far the nicest place we stayed in our entire 3 week journey in Argentina/Chile. Excellent value for money. 

Only pro-tip I have is to make sure you tell the taxi driver its on Calle Inacayal (pronounced interestingly enough like in-a-caj-al). There's a Inacayal hotel in town, luckily if you end up there from the airport like us, it's on the main road and you just tell them to keep going to Km6. 

I couldn't recommend a place more. The house alone is worth 5 stars, Nuno's hospitality sends it off the charts. If this place is booked, click on Nuno and rent something else from him. Couldn't have asked for a better host.

We had the most amazing stay at Nuno's place! The  Cabin is just perfect. Cozy, spacious and with the most amazing views you can ask for. It doesn't feel like a rental place at all. Very cozy and with everything you need to have a wonderful time.
It is very well located too close to excellent restaurants and with easy access to the great places to sightsee. In bariloche.
Nuno was great as a host too. Very communicative and with plenty of good suggestions about bariloche.
I highly recommend Nuno's place and wouldn't hesitate to stay there in my next visit to Bariloche.

Nous avons passé un superbe séjour à Bariloche. La maison était telle que présentée dans l'annonce, située dans un quartier calme, avec toutes les commodités , des installations confortables et surtout une vue superbe! Nuno nous a accueillis et a pris le temps de remettre pleins d'informations et de conseils utiles sur les activités à faire et les restos à découvrir, il est aussi venu nous saluer à notre départ. Ce qui a contribué à rendre ce séjour inoubliable! À recommander absolument!

Where to start! Nuno was extremely helpful, warm & friendly. The house was absolutely beautiful beyond expectation. I mean look at that view! Check in & check out were effortless. The home had easy access to the city center and a plethora of outdoor activities. It was walking distance to public transportation, great food & great beer. Nuno's recommendations and hospitality are worth staying here alone- but you add in all the extras and it makes for a dream vacation!

We absolutely loved this place, the house was amazing and had the most stunning views of the lake, was in a good location and was nice and warm. The house had everything we needed and was very comfortable, we really enjoyed our stay and would highly recommend staying there. 

Nuno was a great host, he gave us lots of suggestions of things to do and places to eat, he even went out of his way to help us cancel a trip when I got sick.
O Nuno foi um excelente anfitrião nos recebeu no horário marcado com um pão caseiro é uma geleia deliciosa. A casa é linda e à vista inexplicável. Recomendadíssimo !!!!!
Atendimento classe A , Nuno é incrível, simpatico, nos sentimos em casa.  A casa é linda e nada falta, vista espetacular. Vamos voltar ...
Just perfect, loved it!!

This Airbnb was fantastic both inside and out. The view is unforgettable and the interior is tastefully designed and very clean and organized. I think the owner is an architect and it shows!  We immediately felt at home! 

Nuno greeted us when we arrived and gave recommendations for what to do, what to see, and how to go there - which was very helpful.  It was easy to go anywhere from there especially with the Ramis and there's a fantastic restaurant and a ski lift up a nearby mountain within a short walk.  Overall, I highly recommend this place.

Nuno well deserves his superhost title. Greeted us with a big smile, gave us useful advice and recommendations and made us feel right at home. The house is incredible, views are spectacular and it is well equipped for all your needs and more. We highly recommend Nuno's place and feel very lucky to have had the chance to stay there.

We had a brilliant time staying in this apartment. It's warm, light and has a great feeling as well as contains everything you might need (salt, oil, washer, wifi, towels etc). Nuno was a brilliant host, giving us lots of tips and ideas of things to do in the area. A car would be useful but isn't vital as the buses are frequent and everything is walk-able. The best thing about the apartment however is the view... Incredible!!!

I'm not sure what I can add for Nuno that hasn't already been said. He's a kind and gracious host, and the Mountain House was a clean, beautiful, functional space to spend a week. Nuno is a great host, picking us up from the bus stop to drive us to the house, recommending and even arranging restaurant reservations. We walked about a kilometer to the bus stop on Bustillo avenue each day, about a ten minute walk through residential areas, which was manageable for us. There were small shops for bread and fresh groceries within walking distance, and the house was well equipped to prepare meals at home. The in-home laundry was a godsend in the middle of our 3 week trip.
Loved it! This place is amazing. The view is incredible, the house is warm and cozy and the kitchen is fully equiped, we defenetly recomand this place for couples and famalies

I have to add to the chorus of reviews and say...this place is super! The view is fantastic and very calming to wake up to.  Also, it should be said that the aesthetic of this place is just about perfect -- this place could feature in Architectural Digest.  Also Nuno gave us recommendations on restaurants and they turned out to be great.  Nuno also had a very nice, chill manner and was the perfect host. The only nit is that the beds could be a little bigger, but this is just a small nit.

We absolutely loved our stay. Nuno was an exceptional host, and the place is just as beautiful as the pictures.  The house is very nicely designed, and we felt at home. We had a car and explored the area, but there was also a park, stores and restaurants within an easy walk. The tall trees around the house give it a wonderful sense of seclusion, and we saw many birds from the balcony, as well as shooting stars at night.  The beds were comfortable and we all slept really well, fantastic!
We felt very welcomed in a beautiful and special home. A view and home to remember!!

Nuno was by far one of the best hosts I've ever met while using AirBNB. He met us at the house, gave us a bottle of wine and answered all our questions. He provided some excellent recommendations on places to visit, restaurants to try, etc. The house itself is gorgeous, the views are incredible. The pictures don't do it justice. I can't speak highly enough of the property and of our host, highly recommend to anyone thinking of going here.

Nuno and Manu are amazing hosts. They greeted us with a bottle of vino and provided us with a map of the area. They recommended places to hike/see, restaurants and breweries. The house is amazing, much better than what you see in the pictures. The view and the tranquility of this place is just mindblowing. We will definitely return. One of the best experience on airbnb I have ever had. Thank you guys!!!
Lovely! Comfortable accommodations and picturesque view! Great location! Thanks Nuno for being a welcoming host!

The mountain cabin promised a lot from
the pictures and description and it not only didn't disappoint but it exceeded all expectations!!! A beautiful cabin, homely, cosy and super comfortable. But the best feature is simply the jaw dropping views you come across as soon as you walk into the cabin. The first day was just spent mesmerised by the view of the lake and snow capped mountains which you can see from every room (including the bathroom). The location was excellent to get to he centre and to go the opposite direction where all the activities are. And finally, our host Nuno was amazing. All his recommendations and advice were spot on. He is very accommodating and friendly and I've been recommending his place to all my friends. This is definitely the best AirBnB experience I've had since joining 2 years ago!

Nuno was a fantastic host and the house was a dream. We were welcomed with a bottle of wine and a variety of recommendations for activities and restaurants in town which he then sent us in a message for our reference. Nuno was available the moment we arrived in town, and able to to accommodate our schedule, in addition to being accessable at any time. We really enjoyed using the inside "parilla" or grill to cook on. The floor to ceiling windows made for a really unique experience, as you feel you are outside while still in the comfort of your home.  We rented a car and found it particularly useful, as the house is up a windy, gravel road.  The area, the house and Nuno's warm and welcoming nature far exceeded our expectations. This home made our vacation one to remember. We hope to make it back to this home again as soon as possible :) Gracias Nuno!!

Nunos place was amazing and exactly what we needed to relax for our holiday. Beautiful view of the lake through floor to ceiling windows and lovely fit out, bottle of wine on arrival! We particularly enjoyed the kitchen with indoor Argentinian parilla! We were recommended a great local restaurant for dinner which we could walk to, and buses (we didn't hire a car) were easy enough to catch into town. Would love to come back highly recommend!

There's not much more that can be added that hasn't already been said by previous guests.  All I can say that Nuno and his place are as great as everyone says and maybe even better.  The view alone is worth staying here, but everything else, the awesome and well equipped house (we cooked a few times and never wanted for anything), where it's situated in Bariloche, and just how warm, thoughtful, and inviting Nuno is--make this experience superb.  Thanks for everything.
The apartment is absolutely stunning, arguably even better than pictures. Highly recommended. Nuno was fantastically helpful with everything from restaurants to things to see. A brilliant few days!

We just had an excellent 5 days in Bariloche and all down to the accommodation and recommendations by Nuno. You will come away from this property much happier than when you checked in. The view is unbelievable as is the house. Very quiet, lots of sleep, lots of wine and lots of fun. Nuno marked  up a map and gave recommendations for everything we asked and they we all brilliant. All the best Nuno, we hope to return soon.

This house is even more beautiful than the pictures suggest. Very peaceful and feels secluded whilst being near restaurants and attractions. We came to barioloche to experience the outdoors but ended up wanting to stay inside this beautiful house and enjoy the amazing view of the lake and mountains (which we did every morning for breakfast). Our host nuno was super lovely and friendly, spoke perfect English and gave us stacks of great recommendations. Highly recommend staying here.

Excellent stay in a beautiful part of the world! From the very beginning, Nuno was a great host who made sure we were well looked after and also shared lots of recommendations of things to do. The apartment itself and views from the balcony can only be described as spectacular therefore I couldn't recommend a stay high enough.
We had a wonderful time in Bariloche. The lodge is incredibly cozy, easy to find, and has amazing views. We would stay there again in a heartbeat.

Ao pesquisar opções de hospedagem em Bariloche, essa cabana nos surpreendeu pelo visual, localização e avaliações positivas de outros hospedes. Fomos com grande expectativa,  e posso dizer que mesmo assim fomos surpreendidos. A beleza do local, a simpatia e disponibilidade do Nuno, tudo isso fez com que nossa hospedagem fosse incrível e o único problema foi ter que ir embora.
Uma dica para quem for se hospedar é que se quiser mais mobilidade, é interessante alugar um carro pois os taxis ou remis podem sair caro em relação ao preço do aluguel.

The house was great, perched atop a small hill overlooking the lake.  The front door enters to the upstairs portion of the house with a fully appointed kitchen, bathroom and living room.  It all looks out over the vista with floor to ceiling windows.  Downstairs are two comfortable bedrooms and a full bathroom.  Nanu was a great host.  He was timely on both our checkin and checkout.  He gave us a ton of great recommendations on restaurants, places to visit, and snow skiing opportunities in the backcountry.  We highly recommend this house and Nanu the manager.  We can't wait to come back.

Nuno was an awesome host, caring and always on time. He even had a great bottle of wine waiting for us. The house has absolutely breathtaking views and the pictures don't do it justice. I wish I lived here, but I'll definitely be back.

Words can't describe how uniquely amazing this house is.  It's just like the photos and we were so much happier to stay here than in a hotel. It's secluded, private, and very comfortable. The views are phenomenal and it was very cozy. The house comes fully stocked with kitchenware for cooking, and also has a reserved parking space which is great.  I would highly recommend renting a car if you stay here but it's not absolutely required.  Nuno and his partner made us feel very welcome and gave us perfect instructions and privacy.  I highly recommend this property and I hope to return next year.  Thank you for everything.

Nuno, queremos agradecer e deixar aqui nossa impressão e experiência da viagem a Bariloche. Além de passeios lindos, paisagens maravilhosas e boa comida, nossa estadia foi simplesmente perfeita. Casa gostosa, com uma vista de cinema, toda equipada, aconchegante e com todo o conforto,muito bem localizada. 
Agradecemos a atenção e as dicas , com toda a certeza, voltaremos e sem medo indicaremos aos amigos. 
Obrigado, abraço
Incrível! A visão do lago é cinematográfica, a acomodação é ótima e o Nuno muito atencioso e gentil. Estadia inesquecível.

Pontualidade, gentileza e atenção são os pontos fortes do Nuno, que nos recebeu muito cordialmente com um garrafa de vinho, onde rapidamente nos sentimos em casa. A casa é muito bacana, funcional, muito bem equipada, confortável, exatamente como nas fotos e claro com visual incrível das montanhas, árvores e lago. Foram 9 dias maravilhosos vividos integrados à naturezas ao mesmo tempo próximo a bons restaurantes, supermercados, centro e na rota das principais atrações de Bariloche. Valeu Muito!!! Obrigado Nuno
